channel.title: Comments on: Jumped and parachuted and uuuh what
channel.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. r/BlackOpsColdWar is a developer-recognized community focused on the title.

item.title: By: bashcarti
item.dc:creator: bashcarti
item.description: You are just holding your gun like a gangsta
item.content:encoded: You are just holding your gun like a gangsta

item.title: By: FantasticBlubber
item.dc:creator: FantasticBlubber
item.description: Lmao that's probably the worst angle I've seen yet. Just turn your screen 90 degrees. In all seriousness, hopping in a vehicle should fix it.
item.content:encoded: Lmao that’s probably the worst angle I’ve seen yet. Just turn your screen 90 degrees. In all seriousness, hopping in a vehicle should fix it.

item.title: By: HorseCockdotFuta
item.dc:creator: HorseCockdotFuta
item.description: Happens to me all the time. Just need to get in a vehicle.
item.content:encoded: Happens to me all the time. Just need to get in a vehicle.

item.title: By: Dillpic04
item.dc:creator: Dillpic04
item.description: Bro im fucken drunk i hated looking at that
item.content:encoded: Bro im fucken drunk i hated looking at that

item.title: By: modest_crayon
item.dc:creator: modest_crayon
item.description: Had this happen first time yesterday, I just played the game at a slight angle, hated it.
item.content:encoded: Had this happen first time yesterday, I just played the game at a slight angle, hated it.

item.title: By: lmgesus_r6
item.dc:creator: lmgesus_r6
item.description: There's no fix for this bug. You have to finish objective and respawn. I think some maps have portals that sends you to loading screen but thats how mine worked.
item.content:encoded: There’s no fix for this bug. You have to finish objective and respawn. I think some maps have portals that sends you to loading screen but thats how mine worked.

item.title: By: AudinSWFC
item.dc:creator: AudinSWFC
item.description: Literally never had this happen ever. Is there a guaranteed way to replicate this?
item.content:encoded: Literally never had this happen ever. Is there a guaranteed way to replicate this?

item.title: By: JoinTheTruth
item.dc:creator: JoinTheTruth
item.description: This happened yo me in armada too. Couldn't tell if it was me or the floor on the ship's tilted bcs it was sinking.
item.content:encoded: This happened yo me in armada too. Couldn’t tell if it was me or the floor on the ship’s tilted bcs it was sinking.
